Text: enovate exchange agreementsI understand that Jeff Hodge has forwarded the terms of the storage exchanges to you for confirmation There may be a couple of item to clarify within the terms First under the late notification section please change the forst sentence to read Late nominations available by pm on the nomination day prior to gas flow Also change the last sentence under Payment Terms to read Oneok will pay each month to enovate by the th day of the month following the service month Please let me know if you have any questions Thanks Steve RIchman
